name: Harvester harvests project data from a json file
description:
Project to harvest is passed in via command line

[project].json is name of file to read from


*name: Story Name
*status: Story Status
*updated: Story last updated date
url: Story URL
* type: Story Type (story, bug)
*creator: Name of story creator/requestor
owner: Name of person assigned
*created: Story created date
due: Story due date
* size: Story estimate/size (string)
completed: Story completion date
